faqs.question: Can tenants pay rent online?
faqs.answer: Yes, our tenant portal supports multiple payment methods including ACH, credit cards, and digital wallets. Tenants can set up automatic payments and receive payment confirmations instantly.

faqs.question: How does tenant screening work?
faqs.answer: We integrate with leading background check providers to offer comprehensive screening including credit checks, criminal history, eviction records, and employment verification. Results are typically available within 24-48 hours.

faqs.question: Can I manage multiple properties?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Our platform is designed to handle unlimited properties and units. You can easily switch between properties, view consolidated reports, and manage everything from a single dashboard.

faqs.question: Do you offer accounting integration?
faqs.answer: Yes, we integrate with QuickBooks, Xero, and other popular accounting software. Financial transactions automatically sync to keep your books accurate.

faqs.question: How do maintenance requests work?
faqs.answer: Tenants submit requests through the portal with photos and descriptions. You can assign tasks to vendors, track progress, and keep tenants updated automatically. Complete maintenance history is stored for each property.

faqs.question: Can I create and manage lease agreements digitally?
faqs.answer: Yes, our platform includes customizable lease templates with e-signature capability. Leases are stored securely and accessible anytime. Automated reminders notify you of lease renewals.

faqs.question: What kind of reports can I generate?
faqs.answer: Generate comprehensive reports including rent rolls, vacancy reports, financial statements, maintenance logs, tenant ledgers, and custom reports. Schedule automated report delivery.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app?
faqs.answer: Yes, both property managers and tenants have access to mobile apps for iOS and Android. Manage properties, communicate with tenants, and approve maintenance from anywhere.

faqs.answer: No technical skills required. Our drag-and-drop store builder and pre-designed templates make it easy for anyone to create a professional online store in minutes.

faqs.answer: Connect with major carriers (USPS, FedEx, UPS, DHL) to automatically calculate rates, print labels, and provide tracking. We also support local delivery and pickup options.

faqs.question: What about SEO?

faqs.question: Can I migrate from another platform?

faqs.question: How does AI resume screening work?
faqs.answer: Our AI analyzes resumes against job requirements, ranking candidates by fit. It considers skills, experience, education, and keywords while eliminating bias. You can customize screening criteria for each position.

faqs.question: Can employees access the system on mobile?
faqs.answer: Yes, our mobile apps for iOS and Android allow employees to view pay stubs, request time off, update information, complete training, and access all self-service features.

faqs.question: Do you support multi-location organizations?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Our platform handles multiple locations, departments, and legal entities with location-specific policies, reporting, and compliance requirements.

faqs.question: How does performance management work?
faqs.answer: Set goals, conduct regular check-ins, gather 360° feedback, and complete formal reviews all in one platform. Track progress, identify development needs, and tie performance to compensation.

faqs.question: Can I integrate with payroll systems?

faqs.question: What compliance features do you offer?

faqs.question: How do employee engagement surveys work?
faqs.answer: Create custom surveys or use our templates for pulse surveys, eNPS, engagement assessments, and exit interviews. Anonymous responses and real-time analytics help you identify and address issues.
